description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with the DefiLlama API by translating MCP tool calls into API requests. Dynamically generate tools from the DefiLlama OpenAPI specification to provide up-to-date and comprehensive DeFi data access. Simplify integration with DefiLlama's public API through a standardized MCP interface.

baseUrl.description: Custom base URL for DeFiLlama API

capabilities.name: get_protocol__by_protocol
capabilities.description: Get historical TVL of a protocol and breakdowns by token and chain

capabilities.name: get_v2_historicalChainTvl
capabilities.description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of DeFi on all chains

capabilities.name: get_v2_historicalChainTvl__by_chain
capabilities.description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of a chain

capabilities.name: get_tvl__by_protocol
capabilities.description: Simplified endpoint to get current TVL of a protocol

capabilities.name: get_prices_current__by_coins
capabilities.description:
Get current prices of tokens by contract address
Error Responses:
502: Internal error

capabilities.name: get_stablecoincharts_all
capabilities.description: Get historical mcap sum of all stablecoins

capabilities.name: get_pools
capabilities.description: Retrieve the latest data for all pools, including enriched information such as predictions

capabilities.name: get_chart__by_pool
capabilities.description: Get historical APY and TVL of a pool

capabilities.name: get_overview_dexs
capabilities.description: List all dexs along with summaries of their volumes and dataType history data

capabilities.name: get_overview_dexs__by_chain

capabilities.name: get_summary_dexs__by_protocol
capabilities.description: Get summary of dex volume with historical data

capabilities.name: get_overview_fees
capabilities.description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data

capabilities.name: get_overview_fees__by_chain
capabilities.description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data by chain

capabilities.name: get_summary_fees__by_protocol
capabilities.description: Get summary of protocol fees and revenue with historical data

capabilities.name: get_yield_pools_enhanced
capabilities.description: Fetch DeFi yield pools with enhanced filtering and data transformation. Returns symbol, project, tvlUsd, apy, apyMean30d, predictions, poolUrl, and projectUrl for each pool.

capabilities.name: generate_yield_analysis_prompt
capabilities.description: Generate a comprehensive prompt for analyzing DeFi yield pools data.
